casebody.data:
GREENLEAF TEXTILE CORPORATION, Plaintiff, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. No. 389. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 12, 1933. Benjamin Mahler, of New York City, for plaintiff. Sewall Key and Carlton Pox, Sp. Assts. to Atty. Gen. (C. M. Charest, Gen. Counsel, Bureau of Internal Revenue, and William E. Davis, Sp. Atty., Bureau of Internal Revenue, both of Washington, D. C., of counsel), for respondent.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed.
